job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongThe Rolebrbrstrongp pJellyfish delivers digital marketing solutions across the world for a host of impressive brands from offices across five continents Our awardwinning combination of technology and talent help us deliver paid media UX SEO social media analytics optimization creative and development solutionsbrbrp pWe have an exceptional opportunity for an ambitious and talented Data Scientist to join our team and assist in the Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence applications that Jellyfish uses to drive thought leadership innovate and transform solutions and services for our clients brbrp pAs a data scientist you will work in a fastpaced crossfunctional team interacting with a wide range of stakeholders You will wrangle large and messy datasets of structured and unstructured data build and implement models and algorithms and design and run experiments to optimize media and customer experience The ideal candidate will have a relentless curiosity about various business problems and a passion for inventing databased solutions to those challenges brbrp pstrongResponsibilitiesbrbrstrongpbrul liAnalyze data to discover hidden trends deliver insights and analysis with clear recommendationsli liDesign build and implement predictive models and algorithms to improve and optimize media performance customer experiences revenue generation and other business outcomesli liBuild wellmanaged data solutions tools and innovative prototypes to enable selfservice frameworks li liDeliver effective presentations of findings and recommendations to technical and nontechnical stakeholdersli liDocument analytics projects in a manner that ensures specific processes can be replicated and scaled across an organizationli liCollaborate with multiple teams and stakeholders in an agile fastpaced dynamic and entrepreneurial environmentli brulpRequirementsbrbrppstrongKnowledge and Experiencebrbrstrongpbrul liBS in Science Technology Engineering Mathematics disciplineli liExperience in data science and machine learningli liDemonstrated experience and knowledge of Machine Learning eg linearlogistics regression random forest and neural networks etcli liHandson experience in one of the machine learning frameworks such as ScikitLearn TensorFlow or Spark MLlibli liProgramming proficiency in Python or Rli liProficiency in manipulating large relational databases using SQLli liExperience with big data technologies and cloud platforms such as GCP AWS or Azure etc li liExperience in analyzing media and web data such as Google Ads Campaign Manager Facebook and Google Analyticsli liExperience with visualizing data using Matplotlib ggplot D3JS Looker or Tableauli liExhibit a drive to learn and master new knowledge and technologiesli liDemonstrable skills in creative problem solving with strong attention to detailliul
